title: WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Results
text: April 5, 2018 / 1:24 AM / Updated 25 minutes ago WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 5 (OPTA) - Results from the WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles matches on Wednesday .. 2nd Round .. 14-Alize Cornet (FRA) beat Polona Hercog (SLO) 6-2 6-3 12-Kiki Bertens (NED) beat Aleksandra Krunic (SRB) 6-4 6-2 Fanny Stollar (HUN) beat 6-Johanna Konta (GBR) 6-3 6-4 Bernarda Pera (USA) beat Dayana Yastremska (UKR) 7-6(4) 1-6 6-4 Sara Errani (ITA) beat 15-Mihaela Buzarnescu 3-6 7-6(5) 6-2 (ROU) Camila Giorgi (ITA) beat 11-Daria Gavrilova (AUS) 6-2 2-6 6-3 7-Madison Keys (USA) beat Lara Arruabarrena (ESP) 6-1 3-6 6-3 5-Julia Goerges (GER) beat Kristie Ahn (USA) 2-6 6-4 7-6(1) 10-Naomi Osaka (JPN) beat Laura Siegemund (GER) 6-3 7-6(8) 13-Irina-Camelia Begu beat Claire Liu (USA) 6-4 6-2 (ROU) 8-Anastasija Sevastova beat Caroline Dolehide (USA) 7-5 6-7(5) 6-1 (LAT) 9-Ashleigh Barty (AUS) beat Tatjana Maria (GER) 4-6 6-3 6-2 16-Elena Vesnina (RUS) beat Taylor Townsend (USA) 6-4 6-1 Kristyna Pliskova (CZE) beat 2-Petra Kvitova (CZE) 1-6 6-1 6-3
